Cell.Data:
For most people, World War II is finally over. Not for me. Until my husband Sean is accounted for, the war rages on.

I won't mince words, - Baumeister Confections is in shambles. And I simply can't focus on chocolate right now - I need someone else to manage the company.
You need to show me you can make chocolates - and money. Once you have made at least $10,000, I'll make you %rank_2% and start introducing you to the Board of Directors.
See %main_alex% in %zurich% once you've made some %b03% and have at least $10,000 on hand.
I need to be confident in your abilities to run our business, <player>. Come back and see me as soon as you've made 3 recipes and have at least $10,000 on hand.
Alex has bigger fish to fry, <player>, she is antsy to hand over the reins so that she can search for Sean. She is waiting for you to learn 3 recipes and show up with at least $10,000 on hand.

So, let's get started!

Here are 100 sacks each of %sugar% and %cacao%. Go see Endrit over at %zur_factory% to turn these ingredients into chocolates...
You are looking for %zur_factory%? It's the red brick factory in the middle of town...

I feel for what Alex is going through, , but boy am I excited to get these machines working again!

Click "Make Chocolates" and make at least 5 cases of %b01%...
Remember, you need to make at least 5 cases of %b01%. Ready to try again? Just click "%make_chocolate%" and be sure to make at least 5 cases of %b01%...

Your %b01% look delicious!

All products and ingredients appear in your inventory. You can mouse over items for more information...
Remember to make at least 5 cases of %b01%s.
You're going to need to make at least 5 cases of %b01%. The only place you can do that is at the red brick chocolate factory here in the middle of town - %zur_factory%.

As you travel you can track how many products we're making in the status window below. Inventory levels for each ingredient we're using are shown with color-coded bars - green means we've got plenty, yellow means we're running low, and red means production will soon be stalled.

Speaking of ingredients, in order to keep making %b01% we'll need more %sugar% and %cacao% soon. You're going to need some money!

Visit %zur_shop% to turn your chocolates into cash...
You're trying to find %zur_shop%? It's the red building on the west side of the canal...

Welcome, . Step inside to review my prices.

Once inside, click "%sell_all%" - I'll take your products and you'll get the cash!
Click "Sell All" to sell your chocolates to %zur_shopkeep%.
Remember, you need to click %sell_all% inside the shop to sell me your chocolates - you'll see the money you earned show up in your account.
The only place I know of in town where you'll be able to sell your chocolates is %zur_shop%. Click %sell_all% inside the shop to turn a profit on your creations...

Thank you for stopping by, . It is always my pleasure to offer the best prices for quality chocolates!

Now, go back and speak with Alex - you can find her at the %zur_station%, the main rail station here in %zurich%.

Alex would like to speak with you, <player>. She's preparing for her journey at the main train station here in %zurich%, %zur_station%. That's the building you'll find just in front of %zur_tower% church.

Well done, <player>, you've made some chocolates, and you've made some money. With the factory now operational, I suspect you'll be needing ingredients soon. It's time to restock your inventory of %cacao% and %sugar%.

I'm going to give you $5000. Show me you're ready to take over by doubling my investment.

Now, go see %zur_marketkeep% here at %zur_market% about buying some of what you need.
By the way, you can keep track of all of your to-do's with the Quests window...
%zur_market% is the only place I know of here in %zurich% to buy ingredients. You'll find the market just to the right of the chocolate factory...
Click on the %sugar% inside - it's all I have these days - and buy enough to make sure that you've got at least 200 sacks on hand...
Click on %sugar% and then buy enough so that you've got at least 200 sacks on hand.
I don't think you bought enough %sugar% - you need to have at least 200 sacks in your inventory...
%zur_market% is the only place I know of here in %zurich% where you'll find the %sugar% you need. The market is just to the right of the chocolate factory...
%cacao% is only available near the equator. Click "Map", travel to %douala%, Cameroon, and see my friend %dou_marketkeep% there. She'll be able to fix you up with the %cacao% you need.
Click "Map" to travel to %douala% and purchase %cacao% at %dou_market%.
I understand you're after %cacao%. You need to click on the "Map" button on the left, and then click on the port of %douala% to travel there...
You looking to buy some %cacao%? See %dou_marketkeep% over at %dou_market%...
You've come to the right place for %cacao%, <player>. Buy enough so that you've got at least 200 sacks on hand...
Purchase enough %cacao% so that you've got at least 200 sacks on hand.
I don't think you bought enough %cacao% - you need to have at least 200 sacks in your inventory...

You need to have at least 200 sacks of %cacao% in your inventory, isn't that right?

The only place that I've heard of %cacao% for sale lately is at %dou_market% in %douala%...

Terrific! Now get back to %zurich% and see Alex.

That poor woman, she truly believes she'll be able to find her husband - you have to admire her spirit, though.
Travel back to %zurich% to speak with Alex at the %zur_station%.
Alex would like to see you <player>. She's still at the main train station in %zurich%, %zur_station%. That's the building just in front of %zur_tower% church.

I think you're starting to get the hang of things, , which is good, because I need to leave soon.

Next make your way back over to %zur_market% - Verena has a new ingredient you can use to make a new recipe, something that's always good for business...
Visit %zur_market% and see if Verena's got any new ingredients for sale.
<player>, make your way back over to %zur_market% - %zur_marketkeep% has some new ingredients you'll be able to use to make a new recipe...
Word travels fast! I assume you're here to purchase some of my %milk%, which just arrived?
Bring the ingredients to make %b02% - %milk%, %sugar% and %cacao% - to %zur_factory%.
I understand Alex would like us to manufacture some %b02%. You'll need to make sure you've got %cacao%, %sugar% and %milk% on hand to do so!
I understand you'd like to manufacture some %b02%. You'll need to make sure you've got %cacao%, %sugar% and %milk% on hand to do so!
As soon as you have %milk%, %sugar%, and %cacao% in your inventory, visit the factory here in %zurich% to make a new recipe - %b02%...

Click "Change Recipe", select %b02%, and make as many as you can. More complicated recipes mean higher profits!


Keep trying until you've set production to at least 10 cases...
Make sure that you have the needed ingredients (%sugar%, %cacao% and %milk%) in inventory, select %b02%, and make at least 10 cases.

You're supposed to have at least 10 cases of your new recipe - %b02% - on hand. As long as you have %milk%, %sugar%, and %cacao% in your inventory, you can visit the factory in %zurich% to make more of the bars...

Nice work, .

Take 10 cases of those %b02% to %zur_towerkeep% at %zur_tower% here in town. I trust that you will find her quite generous...
Bring 10 cases of your %b02% to %zur_towerkeep% at %zur_tower%.
How delightful! I am going to take 10 cases of your %b02%, and give you $3000 as well as 200 sacks of %caramel% in return.
My friend %zur_factorykeep% informed me that you'd be bringing 10 cases of %b02% to me one day - is my lucky day going to come soon?
You need to have at least 10 cases of %b02% on hand. Once you do, go see %zur_towerkeep% - you'll find her at %zur_tower% - just look for the clock tower...

I want you to go back and see %zur_factorykeep%. As long as you have %caramel%, %sugar% and %cacao% in stock, you'll be able to make %b03%.

And I hear that Endrit has a new gizmo at the factory that he's eager to show you...
We need the ingredients for %b03% - %cacao%, %sugar% and %caramel%.
Get a hold of the ingredients for %b03% - %cacao%, %sugar% and %caramel% - and bring them to %zur_factory% in %zurich%.

I understand you're ready to work on your 3rd chocolate recipe! The only place you can do that is at the red brick chocolate factory in the middle of %zurich% - %zur_factory%. If you need %cacao%, you'll need to get yourself to %douala% - everything else can be found at the market in %zurich%.

You have on hand everything we need to make %b03%!

Click "Change Recipe", select %b03%, and make as many as you can!
Also, some good news, <player>. I've just wired up a Recycler for our machines. If you don't want to use what's in your gun, simply fire the ingredient at the Recycler - no more unnecessary waste!
Click "Change Recipe", select %b03%, and make as many as you can!
You need to make some %b03%. The required ingredients are %cacao%, %sugar% and %caramel%...
Get a hold of the ingredients for %b03% - %cacao%, %sugar% and %caramel% - and bring them to %zur_factory% in %zurich%.
Word is you need to get a hold of the ingredients for %b03%: %cacao%, %sugar% and %caramel% - and bring them to %zur_factory% in %zurich%.
You'll make a pretty penny with %b03%, that's for sure. You need to have %sugar%, %cacao% and %caramel% in your inventory. Then, go to %zur_factory%, "Change Recipe" to %b03% and make some product!

You now know how to make 3 chocolate recipes. You can travel, buy ingredients and sell your products at a profit.

Once you've built your cash on hand to at least $10,000, Alex will be ready to hand you the reins to the company. Good luck!

You're well on your way, . As long as you've got the needed ingredients in your inventory, your factory will crank out chocolates as you travel.

I hear that Alex will be ready to make a move as soon as you've accumulated $10,000...
Alex is waiting to speak with you, <player>. She is anxious to be on her way. Please go see her in Zurich at the %zur_station% as soon as you can...

<player>, you've done it. You have shown your prowess at making chocolates, and making money. Now I simply must go. Ready or not, the company is in your hands. As I promised, you are now the official %rank_2% of Baumeister Confections.

There are 5 other members of the Baumeister Confections Board of Directors. You are going to need to work with each of them, one by one, to convince them that you are capable of being our CEO. Some you find easier to work with than others, but they are all good people.

I am off to launch my search for Sean. I'll be in touch as I can, and you should also keep an eye out on your travels for my assistant, %announcer%. If necessary, the rest of the board and I will be able to get messages to you through Rick.

Right now you need to go see my uncle Felix Baumeister in %capetown%. I think he's the best board member to begin with. Also, I understand that he's been working on some secret projects that may have significant impact on our business.

I know you can do it, - good luck!
Track down Felix Baumeister in %capetown%, South Africa.
If you're interested in speaking with %main_feli%, you need to go see him at %cap_factory% in %capetown%, South Africa.
If you are trying to find Felix, head over to %cap_factory%, behind the %cap_shop%.

Sean was flying for the Americans, and his plane was lost on a 'secret mission' towards the end of the war. The authorities have been no help, so I have no choice but to try to find out what happened to him. I simply refuse to believe that he's dead. I know that I can count on you to turn things around in my absence...
I just won't be able to rest until I know for sure what has happened to Sean - one way or the other. In the meantime I know that I can count on you to turn things around in my absence...

Pretty soon now, <player>, I'll be harvesting my first crop of specialty cacao. Sure it will be a bit more expensive than your ordinary cacao, but worth every penny. And, if you've got recipes that call for %dou_cacao%, nothing else will do!
Well, there she goes. I sure hope Alexandra knows what she's doing...
